Package com.optiply.infrastructure.data.repositories

Class WebshopRepository

java.lang.Object
com.optiply.infrastructure.data.repositories.WebshopRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWebshopRepository
@Singleton public class WebshopRepository extends Object implements IWebshopRepository
The Webshop table Repository. Used to access the Webshop table with JOOQ type safe operations via the R2DBC driver in a reactive fashion.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final org.jooq.DSLContext
    dslContext
    The DSL context, used to generate SQL queries or get its dialect and other properties.
    private final io.micronaut.data.r2dbc.operations.R2dbcOperations
    operations
    The R2DBC driver, used to execute SQL queries in a reactive fashion, needs DSLContext properties.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Boolean> create(String handle, String url, Double serviceLevelA, Double serviceLevelB, Double serviceLevelC, Short interestRate, String currency, Boolean runJobs, Boolean multiSupplier)
      Creates a new webshop with all fields.
      Specified by:
      create in interface IWebshopRepository
      Parameters:
      handle - the webshop handle
      url - the webshop url
      serviceLevelA - the percentage of service level A
      serviceLevelB - the percentage of service level B
      serviceLevelC - the percentage of service level C
      interestRate - the webshop interest rate
      currency - the currency used in ISO 4217 format
      runJobs - the ability to run jobs
      multiSupplier - if it has multi suppliers
      Returns:
      the mono

      Specified by:
      findVarious in interface IWebshopRepository
      Parameters:
      condition - the condition list
      sort - the sortfield with the field and order
      Returns:
      Flux of webshops found
